info.+content: Haikyu!! - Liceo Karasuno VS Liceo dell'accademia Shiratorizawa
Haikyu!! Karasuno Kōkō VS Shiratorizawa Gakuen Kōkō
ハイキュー!! 烏野高校 VS 白鳥沢学園高校

The Miyagi Prefecture Volleyball Tournament comes to an end. After battling through the tournament only two schools remain- Karasuno High and Shiratorizawa Academy. Sadly only one of these schools can advance to Tokyo. An exciting 5-set match will reveal who moves on and who starts over again.
#1: "Mashi Mashi" (マシ・マシ) by NICO TOUCHES THE WALLS
アニメ『ハイキュー!! 』公式HP
